entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Local blowing snow near the Richardson mountains late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late in the evening except gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains late in the evening and overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 4 April 2023
